page.title: 03MANOR FARM BUILDINGS
page.content: Most of the farm buildings have been converted to a house,which is used by the owners at weekends and for holidays. The{stables}are now used as a place to store garden machinery and tools. The{cowshed}is now a living room and a small bedroom.The{lofts}and{barn}have been changed into a kitchen,with a dining-room and bedrooms over the top. The windows and doors have also been changed and there is a patio,but the owners have tried to keep it looking as it was. The{granary}and{cartshed}are still unchanged.The stone steps are loose and unsafe.The floorboards have rotted.The walls are still plastered inside.They were plastered so rats and mice couldn't get through gaps between stones to eat the grain.
